chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
q: nat
Hq: 0 < q
r: nat
Hr: r = power q 2
Hr': 2 <= r
n: nat
e: nat -> nat
g: nat -> nat
f: nat -> nat
Hf: forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r
Hg: forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r
He: forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j

Goal:
sum_powers r n f e ⇣ sum_powers r n g e = sum_powers r n (fun i : nat => f i ⇣ g i) e

Premises:
Notation power := (mscal mul 1)
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation sum_powers := (fun r n f e => ∑ n (fun i => f i * power (e i) r))
Tauto.FF : Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type] ?TX : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n ->...-> e i < e j |- Type]
Tauto.N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type] ?TX : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n ->...-> e i < e j |- Type]
Tauto.X : ?TX -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type] ?TX : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n ->...-> e i < e j |- Type]
Tauto.Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type] ?TX : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n ->...-> e i < e j |- Type]
Tauto.D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type] ?TX : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n ->...-> e i < e j |- Type]
Tauto.A : ?TA -> ?AA -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type] ?TX : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n ->...-> e i < e j |- Type]
Tauto.I : Tauto.GFormula -> option ?AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type] ?TX : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n ->...-> e i < e j |- Type]
None : option ?A where ?A : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type]
VarMap.Empty : VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type]
EnvRing.PEc : ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type]
VarMap.Elt : ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type]
EnvRing.Pc : ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type]
EnvRing.PEX : BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type]
EnvRing.PEmul : EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type]
EnvRing.PEsub : EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type]
EnvRing.PEadd : EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type]
VarMap.Branch : VarMap.t ?A -> ?A -> VarMap.t ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [q : nat Hq : 0 < q r : nat Hr : r = power q 2 Hr' : 2 <= r n : nat f : nat -> nat g : nat -> nat e : nat -> nat Hf : forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r Hg : forall i : nat, i < n -> g i < r He : forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j |- Type]
sum_powers_bound : forall (r n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), r <> 0 -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j -> e i < e j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) < power (e n) r
sum_powers_ortho : forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < r) -> (forall i j : nat, i < n -> j < n -> e i = e j -> i = j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r)
double_sum_powers_ortho : forall (n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, j < i < n -> f i j < r) -> (forall i1 j1 i2 j2 : nat, j1 < i1 < n -> j2 < i2 < n -> e i1 j1 = e i2 j2 -> i1 = i2 /\ j1 = j2) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun i0 : nat => f i i0 * power (e i i0) r)) = msum nat_join 0 n (fun i : nat => msum nat_join 0 i (fun i0 : nat => f i i0 * power (e i i0) r))
sum_powers_euclid : forall (r n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat), (forall j : nat, j < n -> e 1 <= e (S j)) -> ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => f i * power (e i) r) = f 0 * power (e 0) r + ∑ n (fun i : nat => f (S i) * power (e (S i) - e 1) r) * power (e 1) r
nat_ortho_joins : forall (m n : nat) f g, msum nat_join 0 m f ⇣ msum nat_join 0 n g = 0 < -> (forall i j : nat, i < m -> j < n -> f i ⇣ g j = 0)
power_decomp_unique' : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
power_decomp_unique : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a b : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> b i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => b i * power (f i) p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> a i = b i
power_decomp_lt : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat) (q : nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < q) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) < power q p
power_decomp_is_digit : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (a f : nat -> nat), (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < p) -> forall i : nat, i < n -> rel_iter.is_digit (∑ n (fun i0 : nat => a i0 * power (f i0) p)) p (f i) (a i)
nat_ortho_sum_join : forall (n : nat) f, (forall i j : nat, i <> j -> i < n -> j < n -> f i ⇣ f j = 0) -> ∑ n f = msum nat_join 0 n f
sum_0n_mono : forall (n : nat) f g, (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i <= g i) -> ∑ n f <= ∑ n g
